permissions.user: ## :x: You don't have the `Ban Members` permission.
permissions.roles: ## :x: You can't ban this user because he has a higher role than you.
permissions.higher: ## :x: You can't ban this user because he has a higher role than me.

reason.length: ## :x: The reason must be less than 512 characters.

blacklist.user: ## You are blacklisted from using the bot! For the Reason: {reason}
blacklist.server: ## This server is blacklisted from using the bot! For the Reason: {reason}

other.roleperms: ## {emoji} You don't have permission to use this command! - You need the {role} Role!
other.cooldown: ## {emoji} Please wait {timestamp} before reusing the command.
